student.name: Student
student.description: A student taking a course on LLM applications who is new to AI/ML and has basic programming knowledge but limited experience with LLMs and generative AI.
goals: Understand fundamental concepts of LLM-powered applications
Learn how to build simple apps with LLMs (RAG, agents, etc.)

data_scientist.name: Data Scientist
data_scientist.description: A data scientist with strong analytical skills and intermediate ML knowledge who wants to incorporate LLMs into their data analysis workflows and projects.
goals: Implement LLM-powered solutions for data analysis
Optimize prompting strategies and evaluation methods
Combine traditional ML with generative AI approaches

ml_engineer.name: ML Engineer
ml_engineer.description: An ML engineer with strong programming skills and production experience who is building LLM-based systems for deployment in real applications.
goals: Optimize system performance, costs, and latency
Implement monitoring, evaluation, and deployment pipelines
